tossup_question: -   –  What group of light-absorbing compounds, including chlorophyll b and carotenoids, are found in photosynthetic organisms and work with chlorophyll a to expand the action spectrum of the organism?
bonus_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three organelles that are surrounded by a double membrane: 1) Nucleus; 2) Lysosome; 3) Ribosome.
